title: LG QNED evo AI 75 Inch QNED85 4k Smart TV 2025
description:
LG QNED evo AI 75 Inch QNED85 4k Smart TV 2025


Every Colour Redefined for Immersive Viewing on a Grand Scale The smarter and faster alpha 8 AI Processor Gen2 from a decade of innovation Our processor’s AI engine is capable of recognizing content by genre. Based on this information, it provides the most optimal picture quality settings to deliver better depth and detail. All New Dynamic QNED Colour LG's latest and unique wide colour gamut technology replacing Quantum Dot provides enhanced colour reproduction rate. Bring every frame to life with AI Picture Pro AI Super Upscaling and Dynamic Tone Mapping Pro analyze each frame's elements to enhance resolution, brightness, depth, and clarity. MiniLED powered by alpha 8 AI Processor Gen2 MiniLED enhances clarity and provides contrast for your viewing pleasure. Personalized sound with AI Sound Wizard Choose the audio you like from a selection of sound clips. From 40 million parameters, AI creates a tailored sound profile tuned to your preferences. Al Voice ID with My Profile syncs to you LG AI Voice ID knows each user’s unique voice signature and offers personalized recommendations the moment you turn it on and speak. Find answers instantly with AI Search Voice-activated intelligence powered by built-in AI understands your inquiries. Ask questions and get tailored recommendations that meet your needs. You can also get additional results and solutions with Microsoft Copilot. Solve requests in real-time with AI Chatbot Have your own AI Chatbot actively resolve and help you with your requests. Simply speak to your TV as it can classify your intentions and respond accordingly. Complete your AI experience with AI Magic Remote featuring a dedicated AI button Control your TV easily with AI magic remote - no extra device needed! Simple but powerful click, drag and drop functions make using webOS intuitive and easy to operate. New upgrade every year with award-winning webOS Re:New Program Get the benefits from the latest features and software with annual upgrades. Ultra Big TV up to 100 inches See all your favourite films, sports, and games on LG Ultra Big TV. Dive into high resolution on a super-scale screen. Dynamic Sound Booster powers your sound AI processing enhances TV sound for a more powerful sound experience. AI Clear Sound Precision tone correction enhances sound clarity for an exceptional audio experience. Control sound easier with WOW Interface Conveniently operate your Soundbar settings from your TV. Immersive sound with WOW Orchestra LG QNED TVs and LG Soundbars are the perfect match, made to work harmoniously together to provide multi-surround sound environments. Synergy Bracket The Synergy Bracket positions your LG Soundbar perfectly, ensuring optimal sound in a seamless style. Advanced Gameplay Experience peak gaming with 144Hz VRR, and AMD FreeSync Premium. Get your game on without lag or motion blur hindering your performance. Dolby Vision & Ambient FILMMAKER MODE Experience cinema as the director intended with Dolby Vision and FILMMAKER MODE with Ambient Light Compensation that adapts to surroundings and keeps visuals as close as possible to its original form.

title: Samsung SMT240HD TV 61 cm (24") WUXGA Black, Red, Silver 300 cd/m²
description:
Samsung SMT240HD TV 61 cm (24") WUXGA Black, Red, Silver 300 cd/m²


Artistry isn’t something that can be measured. At SAMSUNG, we believe that artistry is the result of a delicate balance between high-end design and cutting-edge technology. We’re inspired by the world around us and want to create products that are both functional and exude beauty. Introducing the T240HD from SAMSUNG. Beautiful, inside and out. Full HD 1080p 1080p Full HD technology means you are watching the highest resolution images available today. Nearly twice the resolution of regular HDTV, you will experience an astoundingly vivid and realistic picture and incredible image. More pixels mean higher definition and that means more detail than ever before with 1920x1080 Full HD technology, giving you the most lifelike images and astounding clarity no matter how fast the action. enhanced connectivity A comprehensive array of connection options allows SAMSUNG LCD monitors to be connected to external A/V devices. The incorporation of Component, D-Sub, DVI-D, USB 2.0 and HDMI connectors makes connection convenient and complete. invisible Speaker System At first glance you might think that we forgot to include the speakers, but with our innovative invisible Speaker System, they are neatly hidden within the body of the monitor in order to maintain the clean, fluid lines of the exterior. For an even more enhanced surround sound experience, the T series monitor includes SRS Tru Surround XT TM, a patented audio technology specifically designed for a two-speaker output system. Plus, our parametric EQ technology enables our speakers to reproduce deeper and clearer sound without distortion over the entire range of frequencies. embedded DTV Tuner With the built-in Digital Television (DTV) tuner, the T series immediately widens your entertainment world. Unlike many monitors, the T series can decode and display free, over-the-air digital TV broadcasts without buying any additional equipment. 2 HDMI Now fully equipped with two HDMI (High Definition Multimedia Interface) connections. Connect HD digital devices such as AC devices, game consoles, digital cameras and camcorders into the two HDMI ports to make the most of your HD experience. low power consumption Power consumption is always a concern when it comes to home electronics. The T series monitor from SAMSUNG consumes only 65-70W in peration mode. Compared to other monitors, that’s a reduction of almost 30W! And with the unique SoftPower Off function, the monitor consumes a mere 0.3W during standby. So with the T series, you can work productively at home without worrying about driving up your energy bill


Key Specifications:
- **Other features**: Power requirements: AC 100 - 240V 50/60Hz; Storage temperature (T-T): -20 - 45 °C; Operating relative humidity (H-H): 10 - 80%; Display: LCD; Monitor sync input signal: Separate H/V, Composite; Pixel pitch: 0.270 x 0.270 mm; Relative humidity: 5 - 95%; Horizontal scan range: 30 - 81 kHz; Vertical scan range: 56 - 75 Hz
- **Weight & dimensions**: Width (with stand): 573 mm; Depth (with stand): 245 mm; Height (with stand): 477 mm; Width (without stand): 573 mm; Depth (without stand): 87 mm; Height (without stand): 409 mm; Weight (without stand): 7.3 kg
- **Operational conditions**: Operating temperature (T-T): 10 - 40 °C
- **Power**: Power consumption (typical): 75 W; Power consumption (standby): 2 W
- **Ports & interfaces**: HDMI ports quantity: 2; Component video (YPbPr/YCbCr) in: 1; Audio (L/R) in: 1; Digital audio optical out: 1; Headphone outputs: 1; SCART ports quantity: 1; RGB ports quantity: 1
- **Design**: Product colour: Black, Red, Silver; LED indicators: Stand-by
- **Audio**: Number of speakers: 2; RMS rated power: 6 W; Audio system: SRS TruSurround XT
- **TV tuner**: Tuner type: Digital
- **Display**: Display diagonal: 61 cm (24"); HD type: WUXGA; Display resolution: 1920 x 1200 pixels; Display technology: LCD; Native aspect ratio: 16:9; Display brightness: 300 cd/m²; Contrast ratio (typical): 1000:1; Response time: 5 ms; Contrast ratio (dynamic): 10000:1; Viewing angle, horizontal: 160°; Viewing angle, vertical: 160°

title: Samsung 65" QLED Q7F5 4K Vision AI Smart TV (2025)
description:
Samsung 65" QLED Q7F5 4K Vision AI Smart TV (2025)


Revel in full 4K resolution Q4 AI Processor Experience optimised full 4K viewing with our smart, adaptive AI processor. See every frame in crystal clarity and full colour with intelligent scene-by-scene upscaling for superb cinematic visuals. Picture-perfect colour 100% Colour Volume with Real Quantum Dot Enjoy picture-perfect Pantone-validated colour in every scene and on every game with Quantum Dot technology. Lose yourself in truly cinematic visuals with boosted brightness for vivid and true-to-life colours and brightness. Real Colours, Real QLED. You deserve nothing less. Vibrant and accurate colours amplified by Samsungs Quantum Dot sheet that delivers 100% colour volume. Upgrade your space Slim Look This beautifully slim design blends into your decor, elevating your style without taking it over. Say goodbye to disposable batteries SolarCell Remote Consciously crafted, the universal remote charges on indoor light and keeps its charge from Radio-Frequency power harvesting, so you don't need any disposable batteries. Tailored recommendations from your favourite apps Smart TV Powered by Tizen OS Spend less time searching and more time watching. With BBC iPlayer, Netflix, Disney+, YouTube, Xbox and more, get personalised recommendations and instant access to the latest shows and movies on the best streaming apps. Plus access to 1,000s of extra TV Shows and Movies on Samsung TV Plus - all for free. Keeping your private information private Samsung Knox Security With today's TVs holding your passwords and private payment information, Samsung Knox Security keeps your data protected with multi-layered security, constant system monitoring and updates and the automatic blocking of harmful attacks. Stay secured, stay entertained. As easy as asking Bixby and Alexa Control your TV with your favourite Voice Assistant - with Bixby and Alexa built-in to your TV. Ask them to change the volume, find that new series, bring up your holiday photos, or check on your connected devices in your smart home. The possibilities are endless – you just need to ask. Tailored sound, so you hear every detail Adaptive Sound Experience optimised audio for your viewing with every element of dialogue, music and sound effects individually tailored to what you're watching. Hear every word of a whispered exchange and feel every blast in a blockbuster set piece. One-of-a-kind visuals that match your mood Generative Wallpaper Create visuals that match your mood. Whether you're hosting, unwinding or relaxing, our AI-powered wallpaper creates stunning one-of-a-kind visuals that transform your space. Your visuals, boosted 4K Upscaling Enjoy 4K picture quality for viewing your favourite movies, shows and YouTube videos. See everything upscaled into clearer, brighter and better picture. Add colour to every scene Colour Booster Pro Our smart AI Colour Booster intelligently adjusts and enhances colour levels scene-by-scene. From the darkest night shots to the brightest landscapes, enjoy consistently high and accurate levels of colour for a bolder viewing experience whatever you're watching. Open up previously hidden depth and detail Quantum HDR Want to see exactly whats lurking in the shadows of that terrifying scene, or witness the true beauty within that sun-soaked beach? See the detail in every scene with boosted brightness and colour for immersive, vivid viewing. Enjoy authentic colour, validated by PANTONE PANTONE Validated Enjoy colour validated by industry leading experts at Pantone®. Samsung TVs are verified for the accurate representation of up to 2,030 Pantone colours and 110 added skin tones so that every hue, tint and skin tone offers a more accurate and beautiful picture. Samsung TVs and soundbars, the perfect harmony Samsung Q-Symphony Boost your viewing experience with integrated sound from your TV and soundbar. Why let a soundbar or TV work solo when you can amp up your entertainment with even more powerful speakers that work together seamlessly, for a fully immersive sound experience. Sound that tracks the action on-screen Object Tracking Sound Lite Hear onscreen action amplified from left-to-right as your entertainment unfolds. So you can hear a car fly along your screen or the crowd cheering all around you. Game all day - no console needed. Gaming Hub Samsung Gaming Hub brings together the biggest console and streaming games from Xbox and other industry-leading partners, all in on one place. With no downloads, storage limits or console required, just turn on your TV and play. Stay one step ahead Motion Xcelerator Experience clear picture and smooth performance with Motion Xcelerator. Samsungs clear motion rate algorithms predict and automatically compensate frames, so your picture adapts as fast as your game. Just turn on and play AI Auto Game Mode Get the edge over your competition. AI Auto Game Mode recognises the genre of game you are playing, and automatically adjusts the settings. RPG? Witness incredible graphics. Racing? Experience ultra-smooth motion. So all you need to do is turn on your game and play. Level Up Your Gameplay Game Bar The advanced Game Bar puts you in command, so you can optimise your gameplay with ease. Switch between wide 21:9 or ultrawide 32:9 aspect ratios, check input lag, activate virtual aim point or minimap zoom, and more. Entertainment for every day. Always for free. Samsung TV Plus Watch 1000s of TV shows and movies, all for free, anytime, anywhere you want with Samsung TV Plus. Get instant access to live and on demand entertainment like The Graham Norton Show and Poldark. Stream the latest news on Sky News and catch-up on kids shows, sports and more with no strings attached. Your home, your gallery Art Store Display your personal art collection from your TV. Choose from a growing library of 3,000+ pieces, curated from world-leading museums and artists such as The Met, MoMA, Salvador Dali, Keith Haring and more. Famous classics, modern artworks or stunning photography - make a gallery of your space. Set your hands free Universal Gestures Turn your wrist into the remote. Universal Gestures lets you control your TV with simple motions of your Galaxy Watch. Whether you're working out, cooking, or multitasking, easily control your TV with intuitive gestures. Monitor your energy consumption AI Energy Mode Easy energy management with AI Energy Mode and SmartThings. With AI Energy Mode, your TV adjusts the brightness depending on the content you are watching and the surrounding light levels in your room to manage overall energy consumption. Then, you can monitor the energy usage of your TV and other compatible devices through the Map View on your TV [1] Control your TV from your phone Quick Remote Use your smartphone as your remote. With Quick Remote, use your smartphone to change channels, adjust the volume, and more.
